name: Adder Strike

sections.name: Prerequisites
sections.description: Poison use class feature, Craft (alchemy) 1 rank, Improved Unarmed Strike.

sections.body: As a swift action, you can apply one dose of contact or injury poison to two body parts that you use for unarmed strikes. You must still protect yourself against exposure to contact poisons you apply in this way.
sections.name: Benefits

sections.body: Applying poison to a weapon or single piece of ammunition is a standard action.
sections.name: Normal

description: You can quickly apply poison to gloved hands, protected feet, or other protected body parts, delivering the poison with your unarmed strikes.
